description.lang: Battery operated hand-held Z-Wave remote control usable either as a primary or as a secondary controller (the latter in the network of another primary Z-Wave controller, e.g. an IP gateway).Can operate up to 8 different groups of Z-Wave devices (maximum 8 devices per group) or activate up to 8 scenes (as a secondary controller).Can create associations between two or more devices which are in the same Z-Wave network.Feedback through 12 LEDs.Covered in genuine leather (4 colours)with real wood (5 tints) and comes with a magnetic wall mounting clip.Works with 2 AA batteries (LR06).
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline + 8 association grouops corresponding to the 8 device keys of the RemSwiid remote

name.lang: Set priority Association Group number for an Association Source Node

description.lang: 1 = Association Group 1 (key A = AG#2)2 = Association Group 2 (key A = AG#1)
See above

name.lang: Send unsolicited Battery Report on Wake Up

description.lang: 0 = No1 = To same node as wake up notification2 = Broadcast to neighbours
See above
0 = Continues dimming until Stop Command key is pressed1 = Stops dimming when Up or Down Command key is released
See above

name.lang: Function of RemSwiid Device key A

description.lang: 0 = Disabled1 = Basic/Multilevel Switch 22 = Control Central Scene 13 = Control Scene Activation 1
See above

name.lang: Function of RemSwiid Device key B

description.lang: 0 = Disabled1 = Basic/Multilevel Switch 3 2 = Control Central Scene 23 = Control Scene Activation 2
See above

name.lang: Function of RemSwiid Device key C

description.lang: 0 = Disabled1 = Basic/Multilevel Switch 42 = Control Central Scene 33 = Control Scene Activation 3
See above

name.lang: Function of RemSwiid Device key D

description.lang: 0 = Disabled1 = Basic/Multilevel Switch 52 = Control Door Locks 43 = Control Scene Activation 4
See above

name.lang: Function of RemSwiid Device key E

description.lang: 0 = Disabled1 = Basic/Multilevel Switch 62 = Control Central Scene 53 = Control Scene Activation 5
See above

name.lang: Function of RemSwiid Device key F

description.lang: 0 = Disabled1 = Basic/Multilevel Switch 72 = Control Central Scene 63 = Control Scene Activation 6
See above

name.lang: Function of RemSwiid Device key G

description.lang: 0 = Disabled1 = Basic/Multilevel Switch 82 = Control Central Scene 73 = Control Scene Activation 7
See above

name.lang: Function of RemSwiid Device key H

description.lang: 0 = Disabled1 = Basic/Multilevel Switch 92 = Control Central Scene 83 = Control Scene Activation 8
See above
